(:action prepare ; Prepare an area or setup for a task
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - target)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?target) (not (prepared ?target)))
  :effect (prepared ?target))

(:action take ; Take an item and update its status
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?source - entity ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?source) (attached ?item ?source))
  :effect (and (not (attached ?item ?source))

(:action moisten ; Moisten an item and apply a substance
 :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?substance - substance)
 :precondition (and (cut ?item) (drier ?item) (inventory ?p ?substance))
 :effect (and (moistened ?item) (dipped ?item ?substance))
